pages.text: Some changes to the Quark have been made. They are...

pages.title: Renames
pages.text: Copper Pipe>Copper Tube$(br)Iron Plate>Plating$(br)Blaze Lantern>Blazing Lantern$(br)Dragon Scale>Mysterious Scale$(br)Ender Watcher>Watcher$(br)Ravager Hide>Large Hide

pages.title: Matrix Influences
pages.text: Additional enchantment influences have been added to certain candles. See $(l:essentials/enchants)Reference: Enchanting$().
